name: KiWi (DimenionsXYZ)
description:
I’ve been separated from my host, Ki. I must make it back to her at all costs. The woods are scary and barren. But I am not alone!

Everything is dead. But I can make them alive again.

If it is alive, my chances are slim. It must not see me jump. I must keep going.

Played Best With Controller Xbox

Left thumb to move
A to Jump

PS

Left Analog to move
X to Jump

There are Keyboard controls (WASD/Arrows + Enter)  but the game is best played with controller.

Install

Download folder and extract. Double click the exe

Extras

Sound Fx can be a touch loud with the enemies.

For better performance with game, consider downloading EXE

HINT: If you don't know where the ghosts will pop up, look for blue eyes or an orange base. 

A small puzzle jumping prototype that follows the story of a parasite on his journey at the end of the world to find his host! Sometimes, its better to be alone!

Made for the Brackey's 2022.2 Jam (You're Not Alone!)
